title: Ai File organizer
excerpt: Building a desktop file organizer using Shell commands and the Gemini API.
author: Codem
content:
Ai File organizer

With the help of Shell commands and the chromium free gemini api I made for Codem Echo. I am making a desktop organizer.

Current Implementation

It takes 10 file paths at a time and uploads them to the gemini web. With some initial context via a prepromt I have managed to create the basic skeleton for the organizer.

It takes folder names as an input and has the ai sort them via name context.

Future Plans

Later I'll have the ai create folder names as well based on file name context.

You can check out my portfolio to see more projects.
